alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 22 at 5:22PM PDT until August 22 at 8:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Lincoln County in south central Nevada... * Until 830 PM PDT. * At 522 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over Kane Springs Road between Highway 93 and Elgin. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of normally dry washes and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... rural areas of south central Lincoln County including Kane Springs Road FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
